description: All techniques included within the 2020 Equifax indictment of Chinese PLA members.
name: Equifax Indictment

techniques.comment: Upload to an Equifax web server multiple unauthorized web shells
Located and used Equifax database service credentials
Attempted to hide the origin and location of internet traffic using remote servers
Deleted compressed files after exfiltrating the sensitive data
Configured settings on at least one of the leased servers to wipe log files
Interacted with Equifax's back-end databases issuing SQL commands
Employed a variety of encrypted login protocols, including RDP and Secure Shell
Compressed stolen data in temporary files

legendItems.label: 2020 Equifax indictment of Chinese PLA members
